Articles.Content: I'm going through my KSP files to try to fix the constant crashes (mono.dll mostly), and just checked on KSP_Data. I discovered a GameData folder there, with some mod plugins that I deleted from the normal GameData. Is there even a GameData in /KSP_Data?
I just looked in all 11 of my ksp folders and none of them had a gamedata folder within the ksp_data folder. Is this a super old install? I don't have anything from before 1.0.
The KSP_data folder is the folder where KSP stores it's date like settings I believe, did you by any change install a mod to the wrong folder on accident? It certainly isn't supposed to be there.
